document_data.name: Tassarion
document_data.mainbody: Lord '''Tassarion''' was an inhabitant of [[Cormanthyr]] and a member of House [[Tassarion]] in the 3{{rd}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Legacy: In the {{yearlink|241}}, Lord Tassarion was part of a covert meeting conspiring against [[Coronal]] [[Eltargrim]]. There he lamented the death of his son, who had recently taken part in the hunt for [[Elminster Aumar]].{{cite book/Elminster in Myth Drannor|234|12}} Afterwards, he suggested that, while they needed to move openly against the coronal, they were not best served by a bloodshed that put all the houses against them.
